channel.title: Individual on Current and historical information on the level of Lake Constance
channel.description: Recent content in Individual on Current and historical information on the level of Lake Constance

item.title: High Water 2023/2024
item.description: Winter High Water 2023/2024 In the winter of 2023/2024, the level of Lake Constance was exceptionally high. A new record was even set for the period from December 11th to 30th. The maximum for this period was previously through the winters of 1939 and 1944 has been determined. This information refers to the analysis period from 1888. Here are the maximum values for December in detail: mm_dd Maxmum (based on hourly average values (cm) year with max value 12_01 410 1944 12_02 408 1939 12_03 406 1939 12_04 404 1939 12_05 402 1939 12_06 401 1944 12_07 400 1939, 1944 12_08 398 1939, 1944 12_09 401 1944 12_10 398 1944 12_11 400 2023 12_12 407 2023 12_13 414 2023 12_14 418 2023 12_15 420 2023 12_16 420 2023 12_17 418 2023 12_18 414 2023 12_19 411 2023 12_20 407 2023 12_21 404 2023 12_22 400 2023 12_23 401 2023 12_24 400 2023 12_25 398 2023 12_26 396 2023 12_27 393 2023 12_28 390 2023 12_29 386 2023 12_30 382 1918, 2023 12_31 384 1918

item.title: High Water at Lake Constance
item.description: High Water at Lake Constance The high water mark on Lake Constance is set at a level of 480 cm in Constance. In reality, however, this value tends to be low. If you look at the normal range (mean Â± standard deviation), the “normal” level of Lake Constance on June 28th goes up to 472 cm. The high water mark of 480 cm is reached about every third year. Here is a table that lists the water level with the frequency and the corresponding years.
